description.value:
Your instructions make it easier for you and your allies to scale dangerous surfaces. Signal all squadmates; until the end of your next turn, you and each ally gain a climb Speed of 20 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Mountaineering Training]

Special If you have this tactic prepared, you can use [[/act climb skill=warfare-lore]]{Warfare Lore} in place of Athletics for checks you make to Climb.
